entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler task is passing `/generatedfilesout` even though it didn't create the directory #73075
  • Error when performing namespace adjust for solution or sync namespace context menu #73072
  • IDE0053 has a non-deterministic title in SARIF logs #73070
    17.11
  • `KeyNotFoundException` during compilation of `goto` that leaves lambda #73068
  • Cutting/Pasting a selected Region fails to persist it's collapsed state #73065
    Backlog

Closed

  • Source Generation Issue #73061
  • CS8998 when last character is double quote in raw string literal #73063

PullRequests

Created

  • Have the workspace cache the semantic model (after it is acquired) for the active document (if one exists). #73074
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pass along cancellation token in snippets #73071
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow WatchHotReloadService to change capabilities during session #73066
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • Add comment for max lambda binding value #73050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report error creating delegate from partial generic method without implementation #73060
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use frozen partial semantics for snippet evaluation #73067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Acquire semantic model from Document instead of making a fresh one #73069
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a simpler pattern when working with stacks #73057
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Replace deprecated CI image #73043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72964 to release/dev17.10 #73058
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Updated

  • Document deviation from member lookup standard #72858
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Switch to an explicit stack to avoid stack overflow when computing tree equivalence #73056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `InitializeHandler` to support `VSInternalClientCapabilities` #72960
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable analysis of conditional operator should use best common type unless target typed #73047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move to an iterative approach to determining next sibling in the blender #73054
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
